Brightcove Player SDK for Android: Previous SDK information

This topic shows the previous SDK and plugin versions for the Native Player SDK for Android.
The following links for the previous version of the Brightcove Native Player SDK for Android is for reference only. It is recommended to use the latest version of the SDK along with the plugin integrations.

Previous releases

SDK v6.10.1

17 Jan 2020

The supported framework uses ExoPlayer v2.10.8

The following table contains the Brightcove plugins and partner plugin versions associated with the previous version of the Brightcove Native SDK:

Category Brightcove Plugin Supported Partner/Vendor Plugin
Advertising FreeWheel plugin 6.10.1 FreeWheel AdManager library 6.28.0
IMA plugin 6.10.1 Google IMA 3.11.2
OnceUX plugin 6.10.1
(Deprecated)		 onceux-android-library 2.1.17
SSAI plugin 6.10.1 None
VMAP plugin 6.10.1 None
Analytics Omniture plugin 6.10.1 AdobeVideoLibrary 4.11.0

VideoHeartbeat 2.0.0
Chromecast Cast plugin 6.10.1 ExoPlayer Cast Extension 2.10.8

SDK v6.10.0

19 Dec 2019

The supported framework uses ExoPlayer 2 v2.10.8

The following table contains the Brightcove plugins and partner plugin versions associated with the previous version of the Brightcove Native SDK:

Category Brightcove Plugin Supported Partner/Vendor Plugin
Advertising FreeWheel plugin 6.10.0 FreeWheel AdManager library 6.28.0
IMA plugin 6.10.0 Google IMA 3.11.2
OnceUX plugin 6.10.0
(Deprecated)		 onceux-android-library 2.1.17
SSAI plugin 6.10.0 None
VMAP plugin 6.10.0 [4] [6] None
Analytics Omniture plugin 6.10.0 AdobeVideoLibrary 4.11.0

VideoHeartbeat 2.0.0
Chromecast Cast plugin 6.10.0 ExoPlayer Cast Extension 2.10.8
